### Metaphor
#### with custom styling

Metaphor works by taking something that is known and mapping it onto something that is unknown. This mapping process provides a flash of insight allowing us to understand the unknown a little
better. Metaphors are based on a resemblance between two things, and in this sense they are iconic in nature.
